data.name: Aion™: Limited Collector's Edition
data.detailed_description:
This is the Collector's Edition. Check out the Aion® Standard Edition which comes without the bonus items mentioned below.

A World Divided

Spread your wings and take flight in Aion™, the stunning MMORPG where you explore a celestial world of breath-taking beauty and epic adventure. You are a winged Elyos or Asmodian, sworn enemy races who discover a common foe: the twisted and depraved Balaur.

Wielding devastating powers and sweeping wings, you must restore balance to a land shattered by cataclysm.

Features

  • The Thrill of Flight:
    Soar to great heights and battle in the open skies of Atreia. Flying in Aion is not just a way to travel — it is a strategic and integral part of the game, adding a fresh dynamic to all aspects of the genre, including combat, quests, and exploration.
  • Stunning World:
    Discover a meticulously crafted fantasy world brimming with otherworldly inhabitants, mysterious enemies, and ancient secrets.
  • Epic Adventure:
    Experience captivating, story-driven quests as you play a critical role in a celestial civil war that has raged for hundreds of years.
  • Intense Visceral Combat:
    Engage in a spectacular and evolving combat system utilizing combos, skill chains, counterattacks, and spectacular aerial combat. Plan and execute raids against rival factions, and earn special ranks and rewards through victory.
  • Unprecedented Customization:
    Take individuality to a new level through an incredibly in-depth character creation tool, advanced crafting systems, and extensive item customization.
  • In-Depth Crafting:
    Create potent tools of war and defense through a highly flexible crafting system that extends to hundreds of items, weapons, and abilities.
  • Innovative PvPvE:
    Aion introduces a new dynamic to MMOs by combining both PvP and PvE gameplay into an exciting new style. As player factions fight amongst themselves and against the AI-controlled Balaur, enemies can become allies in a desperate fight for survival. Join thousands in the relentless war for dominance in the pivotal Abyss!
  • Unmatched Visuals:
    Explore one of the most amazingly beautiful and detailed MMORPGs ever as you fight to save a vibrant world, all brought to life by the powerful Crytek engine.

The Aion Collector's Edition gives you these additional in-game items:

  • Black Cloud Wings (gives 40 seconds of additional flight time)
  • Black Cloud Earring (gives an HP and an MP boost)
  • Special character title with stat boost
  • Color dye to tint one in-game item
  • Two character emotes

Collector's Edition of Aion also comes with:

  • Serial code for account creation
  • Access to the full game via a downloadable client
  • 30 days of free game time

data.short_description: This is the Collector's Edition. Check out the Aion® Standard Edition which comes without the bonus items mentioned below. A World Divided Spread your wings and take flight in Aion™, the stunning MMORPG where you explore a celestial world of breath-taking beauty and epic adventure.
data.reviews:
"It is fantastically gorgeous, with thousands of little details to gorge on."
- MMORPG.com, June 2009

"The screenshots don't do this world justice at all. It's true epic fantasy."
- Examiner, June 2009

"The world of Aion is high fantasy at its finest."
- GameSpy.com, August 2008!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS:Microsoft® Windows® XP SP2
  • Processor: 2.8GHz CPU or equivalent
  • Memory: 1GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® 5900 Ultra with 128MB RAM / ATI Radeon™ x700 with 128MB RAM or higher
  • DirectX®: DirectX® 9.0c (6/2008 update)
  • Hard Drive: 15 GB hard disk space
  • Sound: Yes
  • Internet Connection: Broadband
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP SP2/ Vista
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU 2.0GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® 6800 with 256MB RAM / ATI Radeon™ x800 with 256MB or higher 15GB hard disk space
  • DirectX®: DirectX ® 9.0c (6/2008 update)
  • Hard Drive: 15 GB hard disk space
  • Sound: Yes
  • Internet Connection: Broadband
